CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 27, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "...Many prominent local figures aided materially is making Pittsburgh's first indoor horse show at Hunt Armory a real success. The show was well attended and supported, marking another milestone in uplift of our community's organization. - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of man wearing dark double breasted suit and hat with wide brim, holding reins of horse in front of plaid blanket hanging from wooden beams in horse stall in Hunt Armory during horse show
